entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023
